Uses of OneDimensionalLattice in cellularAutomata.lattice
 

Subclasses of OneDimensionalLattice in cellularAutomata.lattice
 class MargolusOneDimensionalLattice
          A one-dimensional version of the Margolus lattice.
 class MooreRadiusOneDimLattice
          A one-dimensional square lattice with wrap around boundary conditions and a Moore neighborhood of radius r.
 class NextNearestOneDimLattice
          A standard one-dimensional lattice with nearest and next-nearest neighbors, and wrap around boundary conditions.
 class StandardOneDimensionalLattice
          A standard one-dimensional lattice with nearest neighbors and wrap around boundary conditions.
